alert.note: Alert for Custer (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 7:09PM MDT until May 23 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Custer County in southeastern Montana... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 708 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 26 miles east of Miles City, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mizpah, Locate and Knowlton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
